channel.title: How can i make it so you cant drop items?
channel.description:
i need to make it so when you try to drop an item it says "sorry you cant do that use ::empty instead" or something
thanks

item.title: How can i make it so you cant drop items?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

musicmad441:

lol you would have to take years doing, just chill

I just done it in 2 seconds… i searched

drop item
it came up with case 87: // drop item int droppedItem = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); somejunk = inStream.readUnsignedByte()+inStream.readUnsignedByte(); int slot = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); //println_debug("dropItem: "+droppedItem+" Slot: "+slot); if(isUntradable(droppedItem)) { sendMessage("You drop the "+getItemName(droppedItem)+", it vanishes into the ground."); deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]); } if(droppedItem == 744 && absX == 2780 && absY == 3515 && q3stage == 5) { server.npcHandler.newNPC(1645, absX+1, absY, heightLevel, absX + 3, absY + 3, absX + -3, absY + -3, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(1645), false); } else if(wearing == false && playerItems[slot] == droppedItem+1){ dropItem(droppedItem, slot); } break;

changed that just to the case number then sendMessage(“dropping has been disabled, please use ::empty”);
and break;

Lol most easy thing ive done

item.title: How can i make it so you cant drop items?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Yer but i want it like dodians server. They have it so if you click drop on an item it will say “dropping has been disabled. Please use ::empty”, because i dont want to make a list in untradable because i only want it not to drop so admins dont have drop partys with out me seeing. Because i can log spawns and trades but not drops

@itzkyle wrote:

Find

public int untradable[] = {####,####,####

put the item ids in there where the #'s are and you can add as many as you like

this will make a item dissapear if they drop it and also it make it untradeable
